headlines.description: Leicester stayed within eight points of Premier League leaders Liverpool by defeating Aston Villa 4-1 on Sunday.

headlines.description: Federico Fernandez smashed home a rebound two minutes from time as Newcastle United came back from one down to beat visitors Southampton 2-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle see off Southampton with late strike

headlines.shortLinkText: Stevens, Baldock score as battling Blades edge past Norwich

events.name: Wolverhampton Wanderers at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers stretched their unbeaten Premier League run to 11 games after they led and then came from behind to secure a 2-2 draw at Bri
headlines.shortLinkText: Resilient Wolves hold Brighton in thrilling 2-2 draw
